label: SSA3
info_overview: The SSA3 is a combination wired and wireless Siren & Strobe Alarm. It works with a traditional wire trigger from a security control panel or as a wireless Z-WaveTM enabled alarm device and will sound a loud siren and flash a strobe light when an alarm message or alert is received on any ZWaveTM enabled network.
info_inclusion:
Inclusion in (adding to) a network:

  1. Set up the inclusion mode at the controller (If the controller supports NWI, the SSA3 will automatically be included at power on);
  2. If the controller does not support NWI, press the SW1 button once to exit NWI mode.
  3. Press the SW1 button again to include the unit in the network.

The controller will indicate that the unit has been included in the network. Also, the Status LED will flash when the inclusion completes.

Inclusion and exclusion are always done at normal transmit power mode

parameters.label: Delay before accept of Basic Set Off
parameters.description: Delay before accept of Basic Set Off
parameters.overview:
Delay, from the time the siren-strobe turns on, before the Basic Set Off command is accepted.
